item.title: Alfred-pushbullet: Push a text to your phone
item.author: 作者
item.description: Pushbullet workflow for Alfred. Features Push a text to another device. Installation Download the latest release and rename it to pushbullet.alfredworkflow. Double click it to import it into Alfred. Double click the “Run Script” button and replace “ACCESS_TOKEN” and “DEVICE_NAME” according to your pushbullet settings. Activate alfred and input “push blablabla”, then press enter. Author base64decode IkRvbmllIExlaWdoIiA8ZG9uaWUubGVpZ2hAZ21haWwuY29tPgo= Download https://github.com/xbot/alfred-pushbullet/
